name: The Void Above
description:
THIS IS WHERE YOUR QUEST BEGINS ‎ Void Gaming presents an all new genre-defying action/adventure game.

You play as a courier who must deliver an important package in deep space during an intergalactic conflict. However, the path to your destination is a hard one since not only do you have to traverse through rubble from the nearby conflict, but enemies from the war are also trying to stop you from delivering the package and take it for themselves.

Aesthetically Pleasing Environment
Momentum-based Movement Multiple Enemy Types

Check out our devlog at: https://voidgaminginc.wixsite.com/thevoidabove/blog
Check out our promotional site: https://voidgaminginc.wixsite.com/thevoidabove/
